text: Ara yakhana kono duhkha-durdasa manusake sparsa kare se takhana amadera dake kata haye sayita abasthaya athaba basa abasthaya athaba damriye theke, kintu yakhana amara tara theke tara bipada dura kare di'i, se takhana ghure beraya yena se amadera kadaca dake ni bipadera samaye ya take sparsa karechila. E'ibhabe dayitbahinadera kache cittakarsaka kara haya ya tara kare cale.
